title: Brandied cherry clafouti
ingredients: ['500g tinned cherries, drained', '4 tablespoons brandy', '120g caster sugar, divided', '240ml milk', '85g plain flour, sifted', '3 large eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon icing sugar, or as needed']
